name: givemethelatestnews
0: ”Alexa, open give me the latest news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: give me the latest news
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Give the best news and it is live now. news and lifestyle.

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, give me the latest news” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, give me the latest news"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, give me the latest news."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the give me the latest news board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
